meanings.sent1: She preferred a nonmanufacturing job that focused on services.
meanings.sent2: The company's nonmanufacturing division handled customer support.
meanings.sent3: His nonmanufacturing role allowed him to interact with people more.
meanings.sent4: The nonmanufacturing approach to business emphasized customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The nonmanufacturing sector thrived on providing intangible services.

meanings.definition: The sector of the economy that does not involve manufacturing goods.
meanings.sent1: The nonmanufacturing sector includes areas like education and healthcare.
meanings.sent2: Many job opportunities are available in nonmanufacturing fields.
meanings.sent3: The growth of the nonmanufacturing sector boosted the economy.
meanings.sent4: She found her passion in the diverse nonmanufacturing industries.
meanings.sent5: Nonmanufacturing plays a crucial role in the service-oriented economy.
